Ren Allen <starsuncloud@...> wrote:
"I am going to order a couple of t-shirts for my boys."

Before you do that, check out an unschoolers home business, with LOTS
of unschooling T's to choose from. She'll even customize them for you:
http://www.cafepress.com/2cool4school

My fave is the "natural child" T.

Ren

messages.subject: From Home Education Magazine
messages.msgSnippet: A friend of mine came across this in Home Education Magazine. www.LowryHousePublishers.com sells a T-shirt with this printed on it. Great definition!
messages.messageBody:
A friend of mine came across this in Home Education Magazine.

www.LowryHousePublishers.com sells a T-shirt with this printed on it.
Great definition!

"unschooler, n : one who learns from life and love and great books and
late morning conversations and big projects and eccentric uncles and
eyes-wide-open and mountains and mistakes and volunteering and starry
nights--instead of from classrooms and exceedingly dull textbooks and
sedative lectures and interfering homework.

Synonyms:

homeschooler, self-schooler, autodidact, rise-out."

I am going to order a couple of t-shirts for my boys.

Kind regards,
Anna
